item.title: By: k
item.dc:creator: k
item.description: i am so wetting my pants. I think I'll re-read the book or something to keep from going insane while waiting for the stateside release.
item.content:encoded: i am so wetting my pants. I think I’ll re-read the book or something to keep from going insane while waiting for the stateside release.
